title: Visual Memory Development Simulation: Object-Space Integrated Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of basic geometric concepts and fundamental digital simulation operation skills
context.additional_context: Learners perform visual memory tasks in VR environments followed by real-time feedback and repeated practice opportunities

learning_goals: Learners improve object location memory accuracy by over 40% across three array types (blank screen/frame/grid).
Learners reduce complex task-solving time by 25% by applying object-space integrated memory strategies.
Learners can explain the impact of explicit array boundaries on spatial memory using experimental data.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
